items.title: Just $17 gets you this tiny USB-C 7,000mAh mini power bank with display today
items.summary:
LISEN’s 7,000mAh Mini portable USB-C charger

Buy for $17 (Reg. $27)

What we love

This LISEN power bank is a solid pick if you’re after a compact option to quickly top-up your device. It features a built-in USB-C connector that works with a wide range of devices, a 7,000mAh battery, and a small display to show the remaining charge. There’s also a silicone cover to protect the connector when not in use. One of its biggest conveniences here is that it plugs directly into your phone’s USB-C port, so you can charge without carrying a cable.

items.title: Hideo Kojima brings sci-fi design to real world with this limited edition ASUS ROG touchscreen 2-in-1 gaming laptop
items.summary:
ASUS’ ROG announced its partnership with KOJIMA PRODUCTIONS to create a limited-edition lineup earlier this year, and we’ll soon have the centrepiece of that collab up for grabs. You’re looking at the ROG Flow Z13-KJP gaming laptop, which is a touchscreen 2-in-1 with a 13.4-inch 2.5K 180Hz panel. This particular machine comes packed with some serious hardware wrapped inside a really cool chassis, and it comes bundled with a custom carrying case that looks like it came straight out of KOJIMA PRODUCTIONS’ Death Stranding. Best Buy currently has a listing for this machine ready to go for $3,699.99 shipped, and you might want to be ready for this one as it’s expected to go quickly. Head below for a closer look and more details to see what you get for the money.
